ComicInfo.Title: The Big, Bad Reveal
ComicInfo.Series: Strong Box: The Big Bad Book of Boon
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE BIG, BAD REVEAL.
When Dixon corners his latest target in the Circle of the Bitten, one rogue member of the Savance springs recklessly into action, putting the mission of the Savance in grave danger. Meanwhile, Frank learns the truth behind the alliance he shares with the Savance... a truth orchestrated through deceptive means, further widening a chasm between he and the Savance in their most critical hour...
ContentsThe Disclaimer explaining everythingIncidence of Angles[At least] 25 miles fasterScoping out the trailDon't provoke the [Bearcat]Staying close to meUncanny faculties hidden in plain sightFrank Boon, the Fantastic Exception
